Stop.name: expo-type-check
Stop.description: Validates TypeScript types in Expo projects before stopping

hooks.command: han hook run --fail-fast --dirs-with app.json --test-dir "grep -qE '\"expo\":' package.json" -- npx tsc --noEmit
